Description: Overview:For sale is a like-new, custom-made Ernie Ball Music Man Luke 2 in Candy Red; one of 35 examples worldwide delivered to original owner in 2009. It comes with an all-rosewood handle, EMG-85 humbucker bridge and EMG custom SLV single-coils in the middle and neck. The guitar comes with all original accessories shown in the photos, and the guitar was almost never played except on rare occasions for family or friends. An additional Vox adaptor and tuner are included with the original box. As a Ball Family Reserve edition ordered in October of 2008, this guitar was purchased as a collector's piece and has no blemishes or defects of any kind. Because of a moving schedule and lack of space, this guitar is being sold without reserve to a new owner who will appreciate the instrument. I will ship via USPS Priority, or if you're in the San Diego area, I can arrange for a pickup. Happy Bidding! Specifications:BodyWood: Alder with mahogany tone blockFinish: High-gloss polyesterBridge: MusicMan vintage tremoloNeckScale: 25-1/2"Radius: 12"Headstock Only: 5-7/8" longFrets: 22 - Low-profile, wideWidth: 1-5/8" at nut, 2-3/16" at last fretWood: Selected maple with rosewood fingerboardFinish: Gunstock oil and hand-rubbed special wax blendTuners: Schaller M6-IND lockingTruss rod: Adjustable - no component or string removalAttachment: 5 bolts - perfect alignment with no shiftingSculpted neck joint allows smooth access to higher fretsControls: 25kohm volume and tone - .10F tone capacitorSwitch: 5-way toggle pickup selectorPickups: Active electronics with easy access battery compartment1 EMG- 85 humbucking - bridge position2 EMG SLV custom single coilSize: 12-3/16" wide, 1-3/4" thick, 36-7/16" longWeight: 7 pounds, 7 ounces - varies slightlyShielding: Graphite acrylic resin coated body cavity and aluminum lined control cover Click for Full-Size Photos Below:
